resources.string: Giving you control over your in-game purchases.
You will be alerted once you have reached your limit.
Spend Alert will help you regulate your in game purchases. Set your limit and time frame for spending of either a day, a week or a month.

Once you have reached your limit Spend Alert will warn you. You have the choice to cancel your spending or continue. If you decide to continue you will be given a 15 minute cool down time, to prevent any spurr of the moment actions.
